en: Dominique informs you it would be prudent to comb through your online profiles and remove from public view anything that might reveal your personal information or information about your family. He's found some, shall we say, unprofessional photos of you on Facebook. But when you search your own name, you realize it'll take all day to get this done. What do you do?

It takes far more work than you imagined. So many sites have your address and require huge amounts of effort to have it taken down! Still, you get some peace of mind from knowing you're safer now than you were before.
You decide to try not to worry about it too much. Who's really going to spend the time to come after you, anyway?
